name: Finding RGB
description:
“Follow the map, find the gems, and bring colour back to the world! On your quest across the greyscale plains to retrieve your colours, be sure to watch out for the spinning spikes, lava, and even a dragon!”

Use 'A' and 'D' to move your character, and Space to Jump/Climb. 

game music by Patrick de Arteaga, patrickdearteaga.com

Final Assignment for IPG 2021/22 IS71030B
